Title: Oeuf
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jennifer Schuur
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: A series of family murders takes place, and Will determines they were conducted by each of the families' missing children, who were abducted and brainwashed into killing their old families ...
